heading: HR00488
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH AND THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON SOCIAL SERVICES, EITHER CONVENING JOINTLY OR SEPARATELY, TO REVIEW EXISTING LAWS AND REGULATIONS ON FUNERAL AND BURIAL SERVICES, TOWARDS PROVIDING  THE PUBLIC WITH ACCESSIBLE AND QUALITY FUNERAL AND BURIAL SERVICES, ESPECIALLY THE INDIGENT SECTION OF THE POPULATION
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2016-11-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00488
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH AND THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON SOCIAL SERVICES, EITHER CONVENING JOINTLY OR SEPARATELY, TO REVIEW EXISTING LAWS AND REGULATIONS ON FUNERAL AND BURIAL SERVICES, TOWARDS PROVIDING THE PUBLIC WITH ACCESSIBLE AND QUALITY FUNERAL AND BURIAL SERVICES, ESPECIALLY THE INDIGENT SECTION OF THE POPULATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2016-10-24
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2016-11-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON SOCIAL SERVICES
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-11-08;
